title: Formosa today
creator_credit: Gordon Bradley, Associated Television and Rank Organisation Film Productions
brief_description: Progress in Formosa (Taiwan) since the arrival of Chiang Kai-Shek, and American post war aid. Rapid development in industry and agriculture, roads and railways, education. With greater prosperity, America’s aid is decreasing, and foreign investment increasing. Poses the questions, whether Chiang Kai-Shek has been successful in presenting Formosa as an alternative to Communism.
